title: Wait 20 working days from when you sent the IHT400 to HMRC
question: Wait 20 working days from when you sent the IHT400 to HMRC
line1: The letter or email from HMRC will be sent out up to 20 working days after you submit your IHT400.
line2: If you have not received your letter or email from HMRC after 20 days
contactParagraph2: Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm (except public holidays)
contactParagraph3: Find out about call charges (opens in a new tab)
